abstract: The results topped forecasts, but suggest that Yahoo was not benefiting from the prospect of an economic rebound as much as Google.
snippet: The results topped forecasts, but suggest that Yahoo was not benefiting from the prospect of an economic rebound as much as Google.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  For much of her tenure as chief executive of Yahoo, Carol Bartz warned investors to expect a steep decline in the company’s business. It has not been as bad as she predicted.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Profit Triples Despite Sales Decline
headline.print_headline: Yahoo’s Profit Triples Despite Sales Decline, and Its Shares Rise Sharply
